### Simple table

```
| Header 1 | Header 2 |
|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   |
```

### Compact table

The outer pipes and spaces around pipes are optional.

```
Header 1|Header 2
-|-
Cell 1|Cell 2
```

### Text alignment

```
| Left | Center | Right |
|:-----|:------:|------:|
|   x  |    x   |   x   |
```
